summary.span: 使用指定的文化特性特定格式資訊和格式樣式，將日期和時間的指定字串表示轉換為其對等的 ，並傳回值，這個值表示轉換是否成功。

span.span: Tries to convert the string representation of a number in a specified style and culture-specific format to its equivalent, and returns a value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded.

returns.span: 如果 參數轉換成功，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the parameter was converted successfully; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法就像方法，但是它不會擲回例外狀況如果轉換失敗。The method is like the method, except that it does not throw an exception if the conversion fails. 這個方法就不需要使用例外狀況處理來測試如果`value`無效，無法成功剖析。This method eliminates the need to use exception handling to test for a if `value` is invalid and cannot be parsed successfully. `style`參數定義中允許的樣式項目 （例如空格或正的或負號）`value`剖析作業成功的參數。The `style` parameter defines the style elements (such as white space or a positive or negative sign) that are allowed in the `value` parameter for the parse operation to succeed. 它必須是從位元旗標的組合列舉型別。It must be a combination of bit flags from the enumeration. 值而定`style`，則`value`參數可能包括下列項目：Depending on the value of `style`, the `value` parameter may include the following elements: [*ws*][*$*][*sign*][*digits*,]*digits*[.*fractional_digits*][E[*sign*]*exponential_digits*][*ws*][*ws*][*$*][*sign*][*digits*,]*digits*[.*fractional_digits*][E[*sign*]*exponential_digits*][*ws*] 如果`style`參數包含，則`value`參數可能包括下列項目：If the `style` parameter includes , the `value` parameter may include the following elements: [*ws*]*hexdigits*[*ws*][*ws*]*hexdigits*[*ws*] 在方括號 ([ 和 ]) 中的項目是選擇性的項目。Elements in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional. 下表說明每個元素。The following table describes each element. |元素Element|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |*ws**ws*|選擇性的泛空白字元。Optional white space. 空白字元可以出現在開頭`value`如果`style`包含旗標，或在結尾`value`如果`style`包含旗標。White space can appear at the start of `value` if `style` includes the flag, or at the end of `value` if `style` includes the flag.| |*$*|特定文化特性的貨幣符號。A culture-specific currency symbol. 在字串中的位置由定義的屬性所傳回的物件方法`provider`參數。Its position in the string is defined by the property of the object returned by the method of the `provider` parameter. 貨幣符號會出現在`value`如果`style`包含旗標。The currency symbol can appear in `value` if `style` includes the flag.| |*簽署**sign*|選擇性正負號。An optional sign. 符號可以出現在開頭`value`如果`style`包含旗標，也可以顯示在結尾`value`如果`style`包含旗標。The sign can appear at the start of `value` if `style` includes the flag, and it can appear at the end of `value` if `style` includes the flag. 可用於括號`value`表示負值`style`包含旗標。Parentheses can be used in `value` to indicate a negative value if `style` includes the flag.| |*digits**digits*|從 0 到 9 的數字序列。A sequence of digits from 0 through 9.| |*、**,*|特定文化特性的群組分隔符號。A culture-specific group separator. 指定的文化特性的群組分隔符號`provider`可以出現在`value`如果`style`包含旗標。The group separator of the culture specified by `provider` can appear in `value` if `style` includes the flag.| |*.**.*|特定文化特性的貨幣符號。A culture-specific decimal point symbol. 指定的文化特性的小數點符號`provider`可以出現在`value`如果`style`包含旗標。The decimal point symbol of the culture specified by `provider` can appear in `value` if `style` includes the flag.| |*fractional_digits**fractional_digits*|數字 0 的一或多個項目。One or more occurrences of the digit 0. 小數點後數字可以出現在`value`只有當`style`包含旗標。Fractional digits can appear in `value` only if `style` includes the flag.| |EE|"E"或者"E"字元，表示代表的值時，會以指數 （科學記號） 標記法。The "e" or "E" character, which indicates that the value is represented in exponential (scientific) notation. `value`參數可代表指數標記法之數字，如果`style`包含旗標。The `value` parameter can represent a number in exponential notation if `style` includes the flag.| |*exponential_digits**exponential_digits*|從 0 到 9 的數字序列。A sequence of digits from 0 through 9. `value`參數可代表指數標記法之數字，如果`style`包含旗標。The `value` parameter can represent a number in exponential notation if `style` includes the flag.| |*hexdigits**hexdigits*|一連串的從 0 到 f 或 0 到 f 的十六進位數字A sequence of hexadecimal digits from 0 through f, or 0 through F.| > [!NOTE] > 中的任何終止 NUL (u+0000) 字元`s`剖析作業中，不論值會忽略`style`引數。Any terminating NUL (U+0000) characters in `s` are ignored by the parsing operation, regardless of the value of the `style` argument. 十進位數字的字串 (對應至旗標) 一律會成功剖析。A string with decimal digits only (which corresponds to the flag) always parses successfully. 大部分的其餘成員控制可能存在，但不是一定要存在，在此輸入字串中的項目。Most of the remaining members control elements that may be present, but are not required to be present, in this input string. 下表指出如何個別成員會影響可能會出現在項目`value`。The following table indicates how individual members affect the elements that may be present in `value`. |非複合`NumberStyles`值Non-composite `NumberStyles` values|除了數字的值中允許的項目Elements permitted in value in addition to digits| |------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------| ||只有小數位數。Decimal digits only.| ||小數點 (*。*) 和*fractional_digits*項目。The decimal point (*.*) and *fractional_digits* elements. 不過， *fractional_digits*必須包含一個或多個 0 數字，或是這個方法會傳回`false`。However, *fractional_digits* must consist of only one or more 0 digits, or the method returns `false`.| ||"E"或"E"字元，這表示指數標記法，連同*exponential_digits*。The "e" or "E" character, which indicates exponential notation, along with *exponential_digits*. 如果`value`代表一個數字以指數標記法，它不能有非零的小數點後的元件。If `value` represents a number in exponential notation, it cannot have a non-zero, fractional component.| ||*Ws*開頭的項目`value`。The *ws* element at the start of `value`.| ||*Ws*結尾的項目`value`。The *ws* element at the end of `value`.| ||*號*項目之前*位數*。The *sign* element before *digits*.| ||*號*之後的項目*位數*。The *sign* element after *digits*.| ||*號*括號括住的數字值的形式的項目。The *sign* element in the form of parentheses enclosing the numeric value.| ||群組分隔符號 (*，*) 項目。The group separator (*,*) element.| ||貨幣 (*$*) 項目。The currency (*$*) element.| ||所有項目。All elements. 不過，`value`無法表示十六進位數字或指數標記法之數字。However, `value` cannot represent a hexadecimal number or a number in exponential notation.| ||*Ws*開頭或結尾的項目`value`，*登*開頭`value`，並在小數點 (*。*) 符號。The *ws* element at the start or end of `value`, *sign* at the start of `value`, and the decimal point (*.*) symbol. `value`參數也可以使用指數標記法。The `value` parameter can also use exponential notation.| ||*Ws*，*號*，群組分隔符號 (*，*)，和小數點 (*。*) 項目。The *ws*, *sign*, group separator (*,*), and decimal point (*.*) elements.| ||所有項目。All elements. 不過，`value`無法代表十六進位數字。However, `value` cannot represent a hexadecimal number.| > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果您使用方法，以往返的字串表示的所輸出的值方法，您應該使用使用"R"格式規範，以產生的字串表示的方法值。If you use the method to round-trip the string representation of a value that was output by the method, you should use the method with the "R" format specifier to generate the string representation of the value. 否則的字串表示法會保留 50 的原始值和資料的最高有效位數時可能會遺失您使用僅方法，以還原值。Otherwise, the string representation of the preserves only the 50 most significant digits of the original value, and data may be lost when you use the method to restore the value. 如果旗標用，`value`必須是十六進位的值。If the flag is used, `value` must be a hexadecimal value. 只有其他旗標可存在於`style`都和。The only other flags that can be present in `style` are and . (列舉型別有複合樣式， ，其中包含這兩個空格旗標。)(The enumeration has a composite style, , that includes both white-space flags.) > [!NOTE] > 如果`value`的字串表示法的十六進位數字，它無法加上任何裝飾 (例如`0x`或`&h`)，區隔其為十六進位的數字。If `value` is the string representation of a hexadecimal number, it cannot be preceded by any decoration (such as `0x` or `&h`) that differentiates it as a hexadecimal number. 這會導致轉換失敗。This causes the conversion to fail. 如果`value`是十六進位字串，方法會解譯`value`為負數儲存透過其前兩個十六進位數字是否大於或等於二補數表示`0x80`。If `value` is a hexadecimal string, the method interprets `value` as a negative number stored by using two's complement representation if its first two hexadecimal digits are greater than or equal to `0x80`. 換句話說，此方法會解譯中的第一個位元組的最高序位位元`value`為正負號位元。In other words, the method interprets the highest-order bit of the first byte in `value` as the sign bit. 若要確定為正數中的第一個數字會正確解譯為十六進位字串`value`必須具有值為零。To make sure that a hexadecimal string is correctly interpreted as a positive number, the first digit in `value` must have a value of zero. 比方說，此方法會將解譯`0x80`為負數值，但它會解譯其中一個`0x080`或`0x0080`為正值。For example, the method interprets `0x80` as a negative value, but it interprets either `0x080` or `0x0080` as a positive value. 下列範例說明十六進位的字串代表負數和正數的值之間的差異。The following example illustrates the difference between hexadecimal strings that represent negative and positive values. [!code-csharp[System.Numerics.BigInteger.TryParse#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Numerics.BigInteger.TryParse/cs/TryParseHex1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Numerics.BigInteger.TryParse#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Numerics.BigInteger.TryParse/vb/TryParseHex1.vb#1)] `provider`參數是實作。The `provider` parameter is an implementation. 其方法會傳回物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊`value`。Its method returns a object that provides culture-specific information about the format of `value`. `provider`參數可以是下列任一項：The `provider` parameter can be any one of the following: - A物件，表示提供的格式資訊的文化特性。A object that represents the culture that supplies formatting information. 其方法會傳回提供用於該文化特性的數值格式資訊的物件。Its method returns the object that provides numeric formatting information for that culture. - A提供數值格式資訊的物件。A object that provides numeric formatting information. (其實作的只會傳回本身。)(Its implementation of just returns itself.) - 自訂物件實作。A custom object that implements . 其方法具現化，並傳回提供格式設定資訊的物件。Its method instantiates and returns the object that provides formatting information. 如果`provider`已`null`，則物件會使用目前的文化特性。If `provider` is `null`, the object for the current culture is used. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫方法使用的值的各種組合`style`和`provider`參數。The following example makes some calls to the method using various combinations of values for the `style` and `provider` parameters. [!code-csharp[System.Numerics.BigInteger.TryParse#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Numerics.BigInteger.TryParse/cs/TryParse1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Numerics.BigInteger.TryParse#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Numerics.BigInteger.TryParse/vb/TryParse1.vb#2)] 個別的呼叫數方法傳遞執行個體的下列`BigIntegerFormatProvider`類別，定義為負號的波狀符號 （~）。A number of the individual calls to the method pass an instance of the following `BigIntegerFormatProvider` class, which defines a tilde (~) as the negative sign. [!code-csharp[System.Numerics.BigInteger.TryParse#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Numerics.BigInteger.TryParse/cs/TryParse1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Numerics.BigInteger.TryParse#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Numerics.BigInteger.TryParse/vb/TryParse1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性所傳回的物件提供用於指派和比較方便零值的來源。The object returned by this property provides a convenient source of a zero value for use in assignments and comparisons.
